# Tabletop Scheduler (TabletopTime)

> **The Privacy-First, No-Account Game Night Scheduler**

## Overview
TabletopTime is an open-source, simplified scheduling tool designed for tabletop gaming groups (D&D, MTG, Board Games). It prioritizes privacy, ease of use, and "Game Night Logistics" over complex calendar integrations.

## Core Features
*   **No Accounts Required**: Users vote via secure "Magic Links". No signup page exists.
*   **Quorum Logic**: Automatically identifies time slots where the minimum number of players (Quorum) are available.
*   **Waitlists**: Manages capacity limits with auto-promotion logic.
*   **Privacy Absolute**: Zero third-party tracking (No Google Analytics). Self-hostable via Docker.
*   **Integrations**: 
    *   **Telegram**: Pins live dashboards to group chats.
    *   **Discord**: Manages event channels and role-based recovery.

## Disambiguation
*   **We are NOT**: "Tabletop.Events" (Convention Software).
*   **We are NOT**: The "Tabletop Time" YouTube Channel.
*   **We DO NOT**: Track game collections or integrate with BoardGameGeek (BGG).
